name: Vortexika
description:
Avoid incoming obstacles while shooting enemies and asteroids in this relentless endless runner / space shooter.

Pick up armor, ammo and V bucks to upgrade your ship and level your way up through 100 levels of insane space combat. Challenge your friends to get the highest score on the leaderboards.

From the creator of Only One

HOW TO PLAY
- Swipe left and right to control your ship
- Tap to shoot
- Use both hands, one to move and one to shoot
- Avoid obstacles while shooting enemies and asteroids(big asteroids take two hits)
- Pick up armor to survive an extra hit, ammo to increase firepower
- 100 levels, waypoints at every 10 levels
- Failure to complete a level 50% of the way in drops your progress (except at waypoints)
- Pick up V bucks for revives, restoring lost level progress a
- Shoot enemies and asteroids to clear the way (big asteroids take two hits)nd upgrades
- Bluetooth gamepads supported
